snippet: Presenting the Federal Reserve’s biannual report on monetary policy, Janet L. Yellen, the Federal Reserve chairwoman, said the economy was growing, but slowly.
abstract: Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen tells Congress that financial markets remain in reasonable health despite signs of bubbles in some areas, including stocks of social media and technology companies, but says Fed does not plan to curtail its economic stimulus plan.
lead_paragraph: Presenting the Federal Reserve’s biannual report on monetary policy, Janet L. Yellen, the Federal Reserve chairwoman, said the economy was growing, but slowly.

headline.main: Yellen Tells Congress That Fed Will Continue to Prop Up the Economy
headline.print_headline: Yellen Tells Congress That Fed Will Continue to Prop Up the Economy
